      • helperForRingAlgorithm

        public static void helperForRingAlgorithm(String s)
        Helper method for Ring Algorithm. Used to iterate through the token and find the machine with highest id and broacast the result.
        Parameters:
        s -

      • ringAlgorithm

        public void ringAlgorithm(String s)
                   throws RemoteException
        Function to help perform ring algorithm. The Initiator variable in this method acts as a flag for ring algorithm. The initial value of the Initiator is false. so it enters the second if condition when this method is invoked by itself. when the token travels as a ring and comes back it will invoke the first if statement and hence declaring the result.
        Specified by:
        ringAlgorithm in interface RMIDevicesInterfaces
        Throws:
        RemoteException
